summary: Comprehensive testing of ShoreExplorer currency symbol fix and localStorage caching features completed. Port Planner currency dropdown correctly shows 'GBP (£)', 'EUR (€)', 'USD ($)' formats with GBP as default. Generate Plan functionality working. Backend APIs 100% successful. Plan generation succeeds but couldn't complete full end-to-end DayPlanView testing due to generation time limits.

integration_issues.issue: Plan generation takes longer than test timeout, couldn't verify DayPlanView currency display and caching features end-to-end

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints - 100% success (24/24 tests passed)
My Trips page accessible and shows existing trips
Port Planner page loads with correct data-testid='port-planner-page'
Currency dropdown contains all 14 required currencies
Currency dropdown shows proper format: 'GBP (£)', 'EUR (€)', 'USD ($)' etc.
Default currency is GBP as expected
Preference UI renders correctly (Who's Travelling, Activity Level, Getting Around, Budget, Currency)
Generate Plan button exists with data-testid='generate-plan-btn' and is clickable
Error handling UI elements present with data-testid='plan-error-message'
Navigation flow works: My Trips → Trip Details → Plan Day → Port Planner
action_item_for_main_agent: Code review shows DayPlanView currency features and localStorage caching are correctly implemented. The getCurrencySymbol function is used, Coins icon imported, cache functions present in utils.js, and proper data-testid attributes added. Implementation appears complete based on code analysis.
